channel.title: ::Pure command help
channel.description: Hey guys I'm having trouble with my new server, I've coded before on other servers with no type of problems. But I'm having problems coding a PI server, I can't seem to make a ::Pure command, can anyone help me? I would really appreciate it. Thanks <3

item.title: ::Pure command help
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

This is the way ::Master is coded.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }
I honestly don’t know how to do that since I lost all my experience in coding, that’s why I’m asking for help

Read full topic

item.title: ::Pure command help
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

That command actually just gave me 97/1 in the stats and 97/10 in hp. Weird huh?

Read full topic
